##########  450,0258 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 22 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  593,0339 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (23 = p.chain_id      OR 23 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id                         
##########  2,0002 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 23 = p.chain_id              OR 23 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  169,0097 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           2 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 23 = p.chain_id              OR 23 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 2       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           3 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 23 = p.chain_id              OR 23 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 6       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           4 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 23 = p.chain_id              OR 23 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 10       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  262,0149 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 23 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  463,0265 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (24 = p.chain_id      OR 24 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id                         
##########  2,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 24 = p.chain_id              OR 24 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  319,0182 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           3 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 24 = p.chain_id              OR 24 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 3       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           4 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 24 = p.chain_id              OR 24 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 7       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           5 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 24 = p.chain_id              OR 24 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 11       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  355,0203 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 24 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  588,0336 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (25 = p.chain_id      OR 25 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id                         
##########  1 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 25 = p.chain_id              OR 25 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           4 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 25 = p.chain_id              OR 25 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 4       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           5 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 25 = p.chain_id              OR 25 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 8       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  323,0185 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 25 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  504,0288 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (26 = p.chain_id      OR 26 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id                         
##########  1 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 26 = p.chain_id              OR 26 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id          
##########  179,0102 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           2 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 26 = p.chain_id              OR 26 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  182,0104 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           4 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 26 = p.chain_id              OR 26 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           5 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 26 = p.chain_id              OR 26 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 5       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           6 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 26 = p.chain_id              OR 26 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 9       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  281,016 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 26 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  452,0259 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (27 = p.chain_id      OR 27 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id                         
##########  1,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 27 = p.chain_id              OR 27 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  220,0126 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           5 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 27 = p.chain_id              OR 27 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 2       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           6 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 27 = p.chain_id              OR 27 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 6       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           7 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 27 = p.chain_id              OR 27 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 10       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  311,0178 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 27 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  439,0251 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (28 = p.chain_id      OR 28 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           6 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 28 = p.chain_id              OR 28 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 3       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           7 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 28 = p.chain_id              OR 28 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 7       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  198,0113 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 28 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  450,0257 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (29 = p.chain_id      OR 29 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id                         
##########  1,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 29 = p.chain_id              OR 29 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id          
##########  195,0112 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           2 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 29 = p.chain_id              OR 29 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           7 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 29 = p.chain_id              OR 29 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 4       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 29 = p.chain_id              OR 29 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 9       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  280,016 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 29 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  438,0251 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (30 = p.chain_id      OR 30 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id                         
##########  2,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 30 = p.chain_id              OR 30 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           7 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 30 = p.chain_id              OR 30 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 30 = p.chain_id              OR 30 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 6       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           2 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 30 = p.chain_id              OR 30 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 10       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  218,0125 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 30 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  473,0271 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (31 = p.chain_id      OR 31 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id                         
##########  2,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 31 = p.chain_id              OR 31 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  153,0087 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 31 = p.chain_id              OR 31 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 3       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           2 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 31 = p.chain_id              OR 31 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 7       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           3 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 31 = p.chain_id              OR 31 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 11       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  222,0127 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 31 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  451,0258 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (32 = p.chain_id      OR 32 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id                         
##########  1,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 32 = p.chain_id              OR 32 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           2 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 32 = p.chain_id              OR 32 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 4       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           3 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 32 = p.chain_id              OR 32 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 8       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  285,0163 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 32 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  446,0256 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (33 = p.chain_id      OR 33 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id                         
##########  1 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 33 = p.chain_id              OR 33 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id          
##########  206,0118 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           2 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 33 = p.chain_id              OR 33 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           3 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 33 = p.chain_id              OR 33 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 5       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  262,0149 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 33 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  452,0258 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (34 = p.chain_id      OR 34 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id                         
##########  1 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 34 = p.chain_id              OR 34 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           3 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 34 = p.chain_id              OR 34 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 2       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           4 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 34 = p.chain_id              OR 34 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 6       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           5 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 34 = p.chain_id              OR 34 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 10       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  202,0116 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 34 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  450,0258 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (35 = p.chain_id      OR 35 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id                         
##########  1,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 35 = p.chain_id              OR 35 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id
