##########  212,0122 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           4 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 35 = p.chain_id              OR 35 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 3       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           5 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 35 = p.chain_id              OR 35 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 7       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           6 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 35 = p.chain_id              OR 35 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 11       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id          
##########  280,016 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           7 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 35 = p.chain_id              OR 35 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 11       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id          
##########  250,0143 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 35 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  462,0264 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (36 = p.chain_id      OR 36 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id                         
##########  1,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 36 = p.chain_id              OR 36 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  207,0118 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           5 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 36 = p.chain_id              OR 36 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 4       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           6 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 36 = p.chain_id              OR 36 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 8       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  275,0157 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 36 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  487,0279 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (37 = p.chain_id      OR 37 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id                         
##########  1 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 37 = p.chain_id              OR 37 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

----------------- GetSales ----------------------

##########  162,0093 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           5 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 37 = p.chain_id              OR 37 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           6 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 37 = p.chain_id              OR 37 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 5       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           7 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 37 = p.chain_id              OR 37 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 9       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  263,0151 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 37 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  454,026 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (38 = p.chain_id      OR 38 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id                         
##########  1 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 38 = p.chain_id              OR 38 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           6 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 38 = p.chain_id              OR 38 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 2       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           7 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 38 = p.chain_id              OR 38 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 6       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 38 = p.chain_id              OR 38 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 11       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  236,0135 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 38 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  442,0253 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (39 = p.chain_id      OR 39 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id                         
##########  1,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           7 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 39 = p.chain_id              OR 39 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 3       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 39 = p.chain_id              OR 39 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 8       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  213,0122 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 39 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  450,0257 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (40 = p.chain_id      OR 40 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id                         
##########  2,0001 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 40 = p.chain_id              OR 40 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           2 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 40 = p.chain_id              OR 40 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  220,0125 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           7 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 40 = p.chain_id              OR 40 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 4       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 40 = p.chain_id              OR 40 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 9       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  266,0152 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 40 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  444,0254 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (41 = p.chain_id      OR 41 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id                         
##########  1 ##########----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 41 = p.chain_id              OR 41 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  133,0076 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           7 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 41 = p.chain_id              OR 41 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 1       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 41 = p.chain_id              OR 41 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 6       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           2 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 41 = p.chain_id              OR 41 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 10       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

##########  227,013 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  rs.chain_id = 41 AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  470,0269 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
----------------- GetPOSes ----------------------
SELECT @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum                      , p.id                                          , IFNULL(p.name, '''') as name                  , IFNULL(p.address, '''') as address            , p.area_id                                     , IFNULL(p.area_name, '''') as area             , p.chain_id                                    , IFNULL(p.chain_name, '''') as chain_name   FROM vw_poses p                                    , (select @rn := 0) rn                      WHERE (0 = p.chain_id      OR 0 = 0)          ORDER                                              BY p.chain_id, p.id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           1 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 0 = p.chain_id              OR 0 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 3       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           2 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 0 = p.chain_id              OR 0 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 7       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           3 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 0 = p.chain_id              OR 0 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 11       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id          
##########  348,0199 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
----------------- GetSales ----------------------
SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           4 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 0 = p.chain_id              OR 0 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 11       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id

SELECT                                            p_d.drug_id,                                  p_d.rowNum,                                   IFNULL( IF(rsbp.num=0,NULL, rsbp.num)               , '''') AS NUM      			      FROM (SELECT                                          @rn := @rn + 1 AS rowNum,                     p.id AS pos_id,                           7 AS drug_id,             p.name AS pos_name                          FROM tbl_poses p,                                  (SELECT                                           @rn := 0) rn                         WHERE ( 0 = p.chain_id              OR 0 = 0 )                ORDER                                            BY p.chain_id, p.id) AS p_d 		    LEFT JOIN (                                     SELECT pos_id							           , drug_id							           , SUM(num) AS NUM                          FROM vw_report_sales_by_poses                WHERE year_id = 6         AND month_id = 11       GROUP                                            BY pos_id,                                       drug_id                                 ) AS rsbp                                    ON rsbp.pos_id = p_d.pos_id                   AND rsbp.drug_id = p_d.drug_id          
##########  354,0202 ##########----------------- GetSales ----------------------
------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
SELECT						   rs.drug_id,				   rs.name,				   rs.chain_id,			   rs.year_id,				   rs.year,				   rs.month_id,			   rs.month,				  SUM(rs.num) AS num		FROM vw_report_sales rs	WHERE  1 = 1  AND ( (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 1)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 2)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 3)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 4)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 5)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 6)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 7)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 8)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 9)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 10)  OR  (rs.year_id = 6 AND rs.month_id = 11) ) GROUP BY rs.drug_id, rs.YEAR, rs.month_id  ORDER BY rs.year, rs.month_id
##########  493,0282 ##########------------------GenerateReportSQL---------------------
